nodes.text: KT-18 (or "Kate") was a housekeeping droid that was purchased by Luke Skywalker at the Droidfest on Tatooine, intending to give it as a housewarming gift to his friend Han Solo.
At one point while cleaning outside Solo's sky house, KT-18 fell off the platform, but was rescued by Skywalker in a cloud car before it collided with anything.
